urls.title: Landscapes to Lifescapes: How does flooding affect us? | The Flood Hub
urls.description: WELCOME to this collaborative project between Lancaster University, the University of Hull and the Environment Agency, exploring how flooding affects our physical and social environment ‚Äì our ‚Äòlandscapes and lifescapes‚Äô. Landscapes to Lifescapes features many games and videos, including our exciting new 360 virtual reality experience, Help Callum. Enter the exhibition via the ‚Äòvirtual floorplan‚Äô below. You can then follow the suggested route or come back to this floorplan to decide where you want to go

text:
https://t.co/pjlcLbCVEu

This collaborative project between @LancasterUni @UniOfHull and @EnvAgency is a great opportunity to find out more about the impact of flooding

urls.title: Your weekly digest of climate and environment news from Imperial
urls.description: Cutting carbon is a priority, but a new briefing by climate experts suggest universities and college s must decide how to treat ‚Äòunavoidable‚Äô emissions. The paper provides guidelines for universities and colleges considering offsetting their emissions. Co-author Dr Neil Jennings, Partnership Development Manager at the Grantham Institute, said: "Following these guidelines will help to maximise the chance that offsets are of a high quality and don‚Äôt have any negative social or environmental impacts." This

text:
